Developed a simple chart based report on windows and used this rptdesign file on solaris with weblogic 6.1 sp7 where the application is deployed.The chart-engine.jar is located in WEB-INF/lib.Why is this error comming up.

Also the same file works on Tomcat 5.x on Windows.I have used same folder in weblogic.
do you mean weblogic 8.1? did you deploy as a war file or folder?

Can you give more details on the locations of all BIRT jars? Did you try with 
the latest build, we have fixed some issues recently for weblogic.
It might be due to an old EMF version, are you using EMF 2.2?
besides chart-engine.jar, are the Eclipse OSGi framework and EMF plugins deployed?

BIRT requires JDK 1.4. I believe Weblogic 6.1 can only support JDK 1.3 at best, 
so it won't be supported. In case Weblogic 6.1 can support JDK 1.4, please 
follow the steps described in the previous comments and let us know if it still 
doesnt' work.
